remarks: Lemma for projection commutation theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjclem1.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjclem1.2 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjclem3 $p |- ( ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) = ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) -> ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ) = ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) ) $.
